cast.overview: In Knockemstiff, Ohio and its neighboring backwoods, sinister characters converge around young Arvin Russell as he fights the evil forces that threaten him and his family.
cast.title: The Devil All the Time

details.biography:
Myles was born on July 19th in Homewood, Alabama. When he was three years old his family moved to Trussville, Alabama. He wants the world to know that he can do anything he sets his mind to.

Growing up Myles pursued interest in piano, soccer, and karate. When he was eight years old he did modeling work locally. In middle school and High School he took drama and theatre classes. While attending Hewitt Trussville High School he was the schools mascot "Huey the Husky".

In fall of 2018 he fulfilled his life long dream for acting for he always wanted to be an actor since childhood. He landed his first role in the Featured Film "Embattled" as Quinn's Classmate. He played an High School teen with Autism. Soon after that he got his very own talent representation, Gail Williamson at KMR Talent to embark upon his professional career of acting.
details.name: Myles Phillips
